mng: actually, place, classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc, that which, particle introducing a relative clause or passive

exm.mng: all, to have, to possess, to own
therefore, as a result, so, the reason why
place, location, whereabouts, domicile, to be located, to belong to (organization etc)
one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with), subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself), belonging to, affiliated, under one's command
research institute, graduate studies, graduate school
